reg_pit.acttitle: Food and Agricultural Products Classification Act
reg_pit.title: Organic Certification Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "organic protected label" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 304/2016, effective September 1, 2018.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: organic protected label means a protected label prescribed under section 11 [protected labels with respect to certification];

change.changenote: Section 10 BEFORE self-repealed by BC Reg 304/2016, effective January 1, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who holds a certificate issued under section 5 of the Organic Agricultural Products Certification Regulation before the repeal of that regulation

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is deemed to hold a certificate issued under this regulation, expiring on the earlier of

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the date on which the certificate would have expired under that regulation, had that regulation not been repealed, and

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: continues, until the certificate expires, to be subject to all terms and conditions, if any, of the certificate that are consistent with the Act and this regulation.

change.changenote: Section 12 was enacted by BC Reg 304/2016, effective September 1, 2018.
